unit.name: Overlord
unit.description: single mode,l 0-1 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Arrogance, Infernal Brand, Keys to the Citadel, Infernal Armour, Hatred, Weapon Master, Flintlock Axe (2+), Great Weapon, Infernal Weapon, Paired Weapons, Spear

unit.name: Prophet of Shamut
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Wizard Apprentice, Infernal Armour, Prophet of Shamut

unit.name: Prophet of Lugar
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Wizard Apprentice, Aegis (4+), Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Prophet of Lugar

unit.name: Prophet of Nezibkesh
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Wizard Apprentice, Infernal Armour, Fires of Industry (1), Engineer (3+), Prophet of Nezibkesh

unit.name: Prophet of Ashuruk
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Wizard Apprentice, Infernal Armour, Prophet of Ashuruk

unit.name: Vizier
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Infernal Armour

unit.name: Taurukh Commissioner
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Infernal Brand, Infernal Armour, Impact Hits (1)

unit.name: Vassal Conjurer
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Not a Leader, Unbranded, Wizard Apprentice

unit.name: Lamassu Scholar
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Fly (6", 12"), Infernal Brand, Light Troops, Not a Leader, Riddle of the Lamassu, Secrets of Nezibkesh, Solitary, Fortitude (5+), Infernal Armour, Student: Infernal Weapon, Lamassu: Harnessed, Magical Attacks

unit.name: Infernal Warriors
unit.description: 20-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Scoring, Infernal Armour

unit.name: Citadel Guard
unit.description: Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Brand, Scoring, Infernal Armour, Shield

unit.name: Vassal Levies
unit.description: 20-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Scoring, Light Armour, Oil Flasks

unit.name: Shackled Slaves
unit.description: 20-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm, Enslaved Porters, Insignificant

unit.name: Kadim Incarnates
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, 0-12 Models/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Fear, Fearless, Ghost Step, Insignificant, Supernal, Swiftstride, Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Aegis (5+), Volcanic Embrace (1)

unit.name: Kadim Chariot
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Infernal Brand, Swiftstride, Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Aegis (5+), Champion of Lugar (2): Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Kadim Beast: Harnessed, Volcanic Embrace (2), Chassis: Impact Hits (D3+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Immortals
unit.description: 15-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard, Fear, Infernal Brand, Scoring, Aegis (5+, against Special Attacks), Parry, Infernal Armour, Shield, Battle Focus

unit.name: Disciples of Lugar
unit.description: 15-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ghost Step, Infernal Brand, Scoring, Theocratic Litigators, Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Aegis (5+), Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks

unit.name: Taurukh Enforcers
unit.description: 5-12 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x50 mm, Infernal Brand, Scoring, Tall, Cannot be Stomped, Infernal Armour, Impact Hits (1)

unit.name: Taurukh Anointed
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, 0-12 Models/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x75 mm, Bodyguard (Taurukh Commissioner), Fear, Infernal Brand, Scoring, Infernal Armour, Impact Hits (1)

unit.name: Vassal Cavalry
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Insignificant, Light Troops, Vanguard (6"), Light Armour, Shield, Vassal Rider: Oil Flasks, Bow (4+), Lance, Vassal Steed: Harnessed

unit.name: Vassal Slingshot
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, Fires of Industry (1), Insignificant, War Machine, Flammable, Light Armour, Move or Fire, Vassal Slingshot (4+)

unit.name: Gunnery Team
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 40x40 mm, Fires of Industry (X), Infernal Brand, Mechanised Support, Not a Leader, War Platform, Infernal Armour

equipment.name: Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (1)
Rocket Battery (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
Titan Mortar (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)

unit.name: Infernal Artillery
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 75 mm round, Fires of Industry (X), Higher Calibre, Infernal Brand, War Machine, Infernal Armour, Accurate, Move or Fire

equipment.name: Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (1)
Titan Mortar (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
Rocket Battery (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)

unit.name: Infernal Bastion
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Firing Platform, Infernal Brand, Mechanised Support, Not a Leader, Strider (Wall), War Platform, Battering Ram: Crush Attack, Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3+1)

unit.name: Infernal Engine
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Fearless, Fires of Industry (X), Full Steam Ahead!, Furnace Breach, Infernal Brand, Unbreakable, Chassis: Grind Attacks (D3), Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6+1)

equipment.name: Titan Mortar (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (2)
Rocket Battery (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)

unit.name: Kadim Titan
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 100x150 mm, Fearless, Insignificant, Supernal, Searing Heat, Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Aegis (5+)

equipment.name: Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (2)
Titan Mortar (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
Rocket Battery (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)

unit.name: Citizen Giant
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 50x75 mm, Giant See Giant Do, Rage

mount.name: Seat of Authority
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Tall, Vassal Governor, Cannot be Stomped, Harnessed

mount.name: Vassal Steed
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard (6"), Harnessed

mount.name: Kadim Chariot
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Swiftstride, Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Kadim Beast: Harnessed, Volcanic Embrace (1), Chassis: Impact Hits (D3+1), Inanimate

mount.name: Bull of Shamut
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Fear, Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Solitary, Supernal, Aegis (5+), Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks, Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3)

mount.name: Great Bull of Shamut
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 60x100 mm, Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Supernal, Aegis (5+), Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks), Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks, Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3)

mount.name: Infernal Bastion
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Firing Platform, Mechanised Support, Strider (Wall), War Platform, Battering Ram: Crush Attack, Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3+1)

mount.name: Vassal Chieftain
Vassal Chieftain on Vassal Steed
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, First Amongst Inferiors

item.name: Onyx Core
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon or Infernal Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks and gain Multiple Wounds (D3, against Flammable). In addition, their Strength is always set to 6.

item.name: Eye of the Bull
item.description: Enchantment: Flintlock Axe. Close Combat Attacks and Shooting Attacks made with this weapon hit automatically. These hits are resolved with Armour Penetration 10, and Magical Attacks. The Strength of the weapons Close Combat Attacks is set to the wielders Offensive Skill, and the Strength of the weapons Shooting Attacks is set to 5. In addition, while using this weapon, the wielders Attack Value is set to 1 and Close Combat Attacks made with this weapon gain Multiple Wounds (2).

item.name: Flame of the East
item.description: Enchantment: Close Combat Weapon. The wielder gains Volcanic Embrace (D3) while using this weapon.

item.name: Mask of Ages
item.description: Infantry models only. The bearer gains Aegis (5+, against Special Attacks), Aegis (5+, against Magical Attacks), and Fear. In addition, the bearer must reroll failed tohit rolls with its Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Blaze of Protection
item.description: Infantry models only. Enchantment: Infernal Armour. The wearer gains +3 Armour. Every enemy model in base contact with the wearers model that could allocate one or more Close Combat Attacks towards it but doesnt, after resolving its Close Combat Attacks, suffers 1 hit with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, and Flaming Attacks, distributed onto the models Health Pool. This is considered a Special Attack.

item.name: Kadim Binding
item.description: Cannot be taken by models with Towering Presence. Enchantment: Shield. The bearers weapons lose Two-Handed if they had it. While using this Shield, the bearer gains Aegis (+1, against Flaming Attacks, max. 2+) and Parry.

item.name: Their Masters Banner
item.description: Vassal Levies and Vassal Cavalry only. While the bearers unit is within 6" of one or more models with Infernal Brand, models in the bearers unit without Infernal Brand gain Battle Focus and may reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase.

item.name: Breath of the Brass Bull
item.description: Cannot be taken by models with Towering Presence or Solitary. The bearers model gains +1 Health Point and the bearer gains Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks).

item.name: Tablet of Vezodinezh
item.description: Dominant. Wizards only. When the bearer attempts to cast a non-Bound Spell using three or more Magic Dice, treat a single rolled 1 or 2 as a natural 3. If the bearer would suffer a Witchfire Miscast effect, treat it as Magical Inferno instead.

item.name: Ring of Desiccation
item.description: At the start of every Round of Combat, every enemy unit in base contact with the bearers model gains one Incendiary marker.

item.name: Golden Idol of Shamut
item.description: If the bearers model is Infantry, its Advance Rate is set to 4" and its March Rate is set to 12". In addition, the bearer can cast Glory of Gold (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Icon of Ashuruk
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count towards Core. One use only. May be activated at the start of any Melee Phase. The bearer gains Volcanic Embrace (X), where X is the number of friendly units within 6" of the bearers unit that contain at least one model with Magical Attacks. In addition, attacks made by friendly units within 6" of the bearers unit, except attacks made by the bearer, lose Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks (if applicable). The effects last until the end of the Player Turn.

item.name: Lugars Dice
item.description: A single model part of the bearers model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. Crush Attacks are not affected.

item.name: Gauntlets of Madzhab
item.description: Infantry models only. The bearer gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration. Each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of 1 is distributed onto the bearers unit, distributed by the owner unless specifically stated otherwise.

item.name: Fires of Industry
item.description: The sum of the Fires of Industry values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to 1 per 750 Army Points, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Infernal Brand
item.description: The model gains Commanding Presence with the following restrictions: it has a range of 6" and can only benefit Insignificant models. In addition, Standard Height units with more than half of their models with Infernal Brand double their number of Full Ranks for the purpose of Steadfast in the First Round of Combat unless Charging.

item.name: Mechanised Support
item.description: The model must be deployed in, and can only join, a unit that includes at least one R&F model with Infernal Brand. The model can never voluntarily leave its unit.

item.name: Taurukh Ritual
item.description: 0-2 Models/Army. The model is subject to the following modifications: - It gains Cannot be Stomped, Impact Hits (1), and Tall. - Its Advance Rate is set to 7" and its March Rate is set to 14". - Its base size is changed to 25x50 mm. - Its Type is changed to Beast.

item.name: Oil Flasks
item.description: Close Combat, Shooting. If one or more simultaneous attacks with Oil Flasks hit, after resolving these attacks, the target unit gains one Incendiary marker.

item.name: Volcanic Embrace
item.description: Attacks made by the model part, including Special Attacks, become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks. In addition, the model part gains Grind Attacks (X), where X corresponds to the value stated in brackets. These Grind Attacks are resolved with Armour Penetration 10 and they always wound on a roll equal to or greater than 7 minus the Armour of the model that the hit is distributed onto". An unmodified 6 always wounds and an unmodified 1 always fails to wound.

item.name: Infernal Armour
item.description: Armour Equipment. Plate Armour. The wearer gains Aegis (5+, against Flaming Attacks).

item.name: Blunderbuss
Blunderbuss (5+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. 0-60 R&F Models with Flintlock Axe or Blunderbuss or Pistol per Army. Range 12", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 3, Accurate, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire. Does not suffer the negative to-hit modifier from a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction.

item.name: Flintlock Axe
Flintlock Axe (2+)
Flintlock Axe (3+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. 0-60 R&F Models with Flintlock Axe or Blunderbuss or Pistol per Army. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 2. Counts as a Close Combat Weapon with Two-Handed in close combat. Close Combat Attacks made with it gain +1 Strength. Can be enchanted like a Close Combat Weapon, but only Close Combat Attacks are affected by the Weapon Enchantment unless specifically stated otherwise. The model may shoot from the third rank (in addition to the first and second).

item.name: Naphtha Thrower
Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (1)
Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (2)
item.description: Artillery Weapon, 0-2 Models/Army. Flamethrower. Range 12", Shots 1, Str 4 {5}, AP 1 {2}, Flaming Attacks, March and Shoot, {Multiple Wounds (D3)}. The hits from an Explosion! Misfire Effect gain Flaming Attacks.

item.name: Rocket Battery
Rocket Battery (4+)
Rocket Battery (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. 0-2 Models/Army. Range 18", Shots 4, Str 6, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (D3), Quick to Fire. When rolling to hit, if two or more dice rolled a natural 1, all hits are ignored and the weapon Misfires. For each 1 rolled after the second, the roll on the Misfire Table suffers a 2 modifier.

item.name: Titan Mortar
Titan Mortar (4+)
Titan Mortar (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. 0-2 Models/Army. Catapult (4x4). Range 6-18", Shots 1, Str 4 [8], AP 1 [5], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)], Quick to Fire.

item.name: Infernal Weapon
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Vassal Governor
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly units with more than half of their models with Oil Flasks within 12" of one or more models with Vassal Governor at the start of their March Move gain +2" March Rate. In addition, the model may join Vassal Levies units. This overrides the corresponding restriction from Insignificant.

item.name: Firing Platform
item.description: Universal Rule. The model can use Special Attacks only against enemy units Engaged in the models Front Facing. All models in the same unit as the model are considered to be in Soft Cover. In addition, they may choose to draw Line of Sight as if they were Gigantic and from any point of the Infernal Bastions Front Facing when shooting or casting spells. If so, as long as the unit has at least one Full Rank: - A maximum of 20 models can shoot. These models can shoot regardless of the rank they are positioned in. - Measure their range from the Infernal Bastion.

item.name: Keys to the Citadel
item.description: Universal Rule. The model must buy Weapon Enchantments for two of its mundane weapons.

item.name: Prophet of Ashuruk
item.description: Universal Rule. Regardless of its chosen Path, the model knows Alchemical Fire (Alchemy) and Blaze (Pyromancy). When successfully casting a spell from: - Alchemy, the model may cast Blaze (Pyromancy) instead of Alchemical Fire as Attribute Spell. - Pyromancy, the model may cast Alchemical Fire (Alchemy) instead of Blaze as Attribute Spell. - Occultism without performing The Sacrifice, the model may cast Alchemical Fire or Blaze as Attribute Spell.

item.name: Prophet of Lugar
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Aegis (4+) and loses Infernal Armour. The model part gains Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks. If on foot, the model gains Ghost Step, its Advance Rate is set to 4" and its March Rate is set to 12".

item.name: Prophet of Nezibkesh
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Fires of Industry (1) and Engineer (3+) that it can use on a single friendly Gunnery Team, Infernal Artillery, or Infernal Engine within 6".

item.name: Prophet of Shamut
item.description: Universal Rule.

item.name: Unbranded
item.description: Universal Rule. The model cannot take any Special Items from this Army Book and cannot cast Curse of Nezibkesh (Hereditary Spell). It cannot join units with more than half of their models with Infernal Brand or units of Shackled Slaves.

item.name: Riddle of the Lamassu
item.description: Universal Rule. The model is a Wizard Adept that selects 2 spells from Word of Iron (Alchemy), Breath of Corruption (Occultism), Flaming Swords (Pyromancy), Deceptive Glamour (Witchcraft), and Curse of Nezibkesh (Hereditary Spell). This rule overrides the normal Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Adept. Before Spell Selection (at the start of step 7 of the Pre-Game Sequence), the opponent must choose Power or Wisdom. - If they choose Power, the Lamassu gains Channel (1) for the duration of the game. - If they choose Wisdom, the model knows an additional spell that it selects immediately from the list of spells above.

item.name: Ziggurat Regulars
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Fight in Extra Rank and Great Weapon.

item.name: First Amongst Inferiors
item.description: Universal Rule. The model is a Champion that loses First Amongst Equals and that has the same Model Rules as the other R&F models in its unit. For the purpose of receiving Commanding Presence and Rally Around the Flag from friendly models, as well as for benefiting from Vassal Governor from friendly models, the model counts as 6" closer to those models.

item.name: Enslaved Porters
item.description: Universal Rule. Shackled Slaves do not cause Panic Tests in other friendly units. At start of the First Game Turn and at the start of each friendly Player Turn, if the Shackled Slaves unit is not Fleeing, Shaken, or Engaged, choose a single friendly Standard Height unit with more than half of its models with Infernal Brand within 6": - If the Shackled Slaves unit is equipped with Shields, the chosen unit gains Soft Cover. - If the Shackled Slaves unit is equipped with Paired Weapons, the chosen unit must reroll natural to hit rolls of 1 with its Close Combat Attacks. The effects last until the start of the next friendly Player Turn.

item.name: Theocratic Litigators
item.description: Universal Rule. The bearers unit and enemy units in base contact with the bearers unit gain Magic Resistance (2) that is also applied to friendly spells. This Magic Resistance value cannot be increased.

item.name: Vassal Slingshot
item.description: Artillery Weapon. This Artillery Weapon can be fired in two ways: - Bolt Thrower: Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)]. - Oil Flask Thrower: Range 36", Shots 3, Str 1, AP 0. The target unit gains one Incendiary marker for every successful hit.

item.name: Higher Calibre
item.description: Universal Rule. The maximum range of the models Artillery Weapon is doubled. Enemy units hit by the weapon suffer -1" Advance Rate to a minimum of 3" and -2" March Rate to a minimum of 6" until the start of the next friendly Player Turn.

item.name: Rock Crusher
item.description: Universal Rule. The number of the Chassis Grind Attacks is increased by +2D3.

item.name: Searing Heat
item.description: Attack Attribute. While in base contact with the model, enemy units suffer -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill.

item.name: Walking Earthquake
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Searing Heat, Swiftstride, Volcanic Embrace (D3+1), and +3 Attack Value. Its March Rate is set to 14".

item.name: Walking Volcano
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Fires of Industry (X), Furnace Breach (see Infernal Engine ), Volcanic Embrace (1), and access to the options below. - Naphtha Thrower (0-1 Models/Army) - Rocket Battery (4+) (0-1 Models/Army) - Titan Mortar (4+) (0-1 Models/Army)

item.name: Giant See Giant Do
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Infernal Armour and Infernal Brand.

item.name: Rage
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. Whenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it gains a Health Point, it suffers 1 Attack Value.

item.name: Big Brother
item.description: Universal Rule. The models Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75x100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

item.name: Giant Club
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Infernal Lash
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. The model gains +2 Agility. At the start of each Melee Phase, you may choose a single friendly unit within 6" of the wielder (including the wielder itself). The chosen units Close Combat Attacks become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks until the end of the Melee Phase.

item.name: Tower Shield
item.description: Personal Protection. The model gains Soft Cover against attacks from models Located in its Front Arc, and Parry.

item.name: Solitary
item.description: The model may never join units or be joined by other Characters.

item.name: Banner of the Twice-Branded
item.description: The bearers unit does not suffer the -1 to-hit modifier for Stand and Shoot Charge Reactions. In addition, at the end of the Charge Phase, immediately after all Charge Moves have been resolved, the bearers unit may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms) if all of the following conditions are met: - The bearers unit consists entirely of Infantry models and/or Gunnery Teams. - The bearers unit performed a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction during this phase. - The bearers unit was successfully Charged during this phase.

item.name: Arrogance
item.description: Universal Rule. The models unit automatically passes Fear Tests.

item.name: Furnace Breach
item.description: Universal Rule. Instead of rolling on the Misfire Table as normal, apply the following Misfire Effects: - 2 or less: The model may not shoot its Artillery Weapon until the end of the game. In addition, the models Grind Attacks become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks. - 3+: The model loses 1 Health Point with no saves of any kind allowed.

rule.name: ID#34
rule.leftTerm: Naphtha Thrower and Fires of Industry (2)

rule.name: ID#35
rule.leftTerm: Rocket Battery (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)

rule.name: ID#36
rule.leftTerm: Titan Mortar (4+) and Fires of Industry (2)
